PATIENT_ID: TEST_BURNS_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-08 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-08 08:10:00
Category II activation for 36-year-old male with isolated forearm laceration
from broken glass. No fire exposure. No heat source contact.
BP 124/78, HR 82, RR 14, GCS 15.
Linear laceration to left forearm, 6 cm, clean edges.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-08 08:30:00
Wound irrigated and repaired with sutures. Tetanus updated.
Neurovascular status intact distally. Discharged with follow-up.
